sense.def:
Kdor je
earnest
, je zelo resen.

seg.quote: ...an earnest young man from the University.
It is my earnest wish that you use this money to further your research.
He was in a corner of the room talking earnestly to Julie.

sense.def:
To be in earnest
pomeni biti iskren.

seg.quote: Is the President in earnest about the desire to negotiate?

sense.def:
Če se nekaj zgodi
in earnest
, se zgodi v večji meri kot prej.

cit.quote: z vsemi silami, na vso moč

seg.quote: Work on the tunnel began in earnest soon after.
